snippet: After a decade of Harry Potter movies, Emma Watson traded Hogwarts for Oxford and Brown. Now the former child star is back on the big screen with a whole new bag of tricks.
abstract: Actress Emma Watson, who starred in the Harry Potter movie series as a child, has moved on to grade-A art house movies as an adult.
lead_paragraph: After a decade of Harry Potter movies, Emma Watson traded Hogwarts for Oxford and Brown. Now the former child star is back on the big screen with a whole new bag of tricks.

keywords.value: The Perks of Being a Wallflower (Movie)
keywords.name: creative_works
